Plot: A young campesino, Germán, recounts a week spent on a farm in 1967 in Colombia, whereby he came to fall into a pit and sustain leg injury on his way to rendezvous with his love, María, amidst the historical period of La Violencia.
Title: Un Jardín Adentro de La Violencia
Actors: Jozef K. Richards, Ledis Arango, Alex Trapp, Iván Osorio Santos
